title: stack based buffer overflows
extract: In software, a stack buffer overflow or stack buffer overrun occurs when a program writes to a memory address on the program's call stack outside of the intended data structure, which is usually a fixed-length buffer. ... Stack buffer overflow can be caused deliberately as part of an attack known as stack smashing.
extract_html: In software, a stack buffer overflow or stack buffer overrun occurs when a program writes to a memory address on the program's call stack outside of the intended data structure, which is usually a fixed-length buffer. ... Stack buffer overflow can be caused deliberately as part of an attack known as stack smashing.
